CSSMin-inline-size.summary: The min-inline-size CSS property defines the horizontal or vertical minimal size of an element's block, depending on its writing mode. It corresponds to either the min-width or the min-height property, depending on the value of writing-mode.

remarks.para:
-The mapped physical properties: min-width and min-height
-writing-mode

CSSMin-inline-size.value: The min-inline-size property takes the same values as the min-width and min-height properties.
